text: qal lahum salh- waqad 'atahum bnaqt akhrjha allah lah min alskhrt-: hadhih naqat allah laha nasib min alma' fi yawm melwm, walakum nasib minh fi yawm akhr. lays lakum 'ana tshrbu fi alyawm aldhy hu nsybha, wala hi tshrb fi alyawm aldhy hu nsybkm, wala tnalwha bishay' mimaa ysw'ha kdarb 'aw qutil 'aw nahw dhlk, fyhlkkm allah bedhab ywm tezm shdth; bsbb ma yaqae fih min alhwl walshdt
